extendedInfo.description: ***Thank You for over 15,000 Downloads!!!!******Thank you for 20-50 downloads a day! Check out the full version on the app store!!****** Like Coin Flip? Be Sure to check out the video for our BRAND NEW APP "Shuffle 5" - a fun word game playable in 7 different languages!******Welcome to Monkey on the run Coin flip - The only game in the android market that is purely based on luck! Flip the coin in the time limit to get the highest score possible. Achieve score multipliers when you land on the same side repeatedly. The result of the coin flip is truly random, so every game is never the same!Compete with millions around the world to get the highest score possible! We guarantee you will be playing this repeatedly ! The Free edition includes:Beautiful high definition art and animationsHigh quality sound effectsEnjoyable soundtrackGameplay modes included are:single flip â a fun way to decide something30 seconds time limit1 minute time limit (full version up to 5 minutes )achieve up to x 10 combo score (full version up to 25)Don't just take our word for it, here is some of our testers and early release users feedback and reviews:Reviews"" Addictive gameplay and great graphics! A well made and completely unique " - 5/5 stars - IndieGameDesigner.com" It is a simple coin-flipper, with the twist being that you can flip a coin as a kind of game, and go for the high score by repeatedly getting the same result.  It has an adorable âMonkey on the Runâ theme " - JustReboot.wp.comUser feedback"Never thought I would be so addicted to flipping a coin!""My eyes light up and I smile every time I get that combo!""I play this with my son every morning to see who has the best luck for the day!""I can't put this down - I've been humming this music all day!""Damn you Jaxel Studios for taking up all my time with this game!"âPerhaps you shouldn't play this game. It's just too addictiveâDownload now to try your luck! Please rate and leave your feedback.Our next update plans to include:Combo % chances â just how lucky are you?Share your scores with friends & family via facebook postingAdded additional sound effectsVisit our website at www.jaxelstudios.comFollow us on facebook at www.facebook.com/jaxelstudiosFollow us on twitter at www.twitter.com/jaxelstudiosMOTR: Coin Flip! Is the first in the âMonkey on the runâ game series. Visit our website to find out more.Other games coming soon:MOTR: Racer ! - Guide monkey through the traffic to get the highest score.Monkey on the run â This platform style classic to guide monkey home from the zoo.MOTR: Story book series - beautiful storybooks for your children to read and enjoy

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: I was looking for a coin flip app for ages. This is one of the smaller ones out there doing exactly what the others do. Why waste disk space eh?
